pullRequest.title: SW_1 - Implement dynamic computation of EDT, LAT and SearchWindow.
pullRequest.bodyText:
Dynamically resolve request parameters using raptor heuristic search. The 'earliest departure time'(EDT), 'latest arrival time'(LAT) and 'raptor search window' is calculated from heuristics using standard "singel-iteration" raptor forward/reverse search.

Regression, make arriveBy work.
Turn 'waitAtBeginning' off.
Rename 'waitAtBeginningEnabled' to 'allowWaitingBetweenAccessAndTransit'.

To be completed by pull request submitter:

 issue:  closes #2931
 roadmap: This is a OTP1 regression - a way to support using one time parameter in the request.
 tests: UnitTests added on most new code - code refactored to be unit testable.
 formatting: Yes.
 documentation: JavaDoc is added, but no configuration documentation. The first version is not configurable. The plan is to test this and implement a more sophisticated configurable version later.
 changelog: Yes.

To be completed by @opentripplanner/plc:

 reviews and approvals by 2 members, ideally from different organizations
 after merging: update the relevant card on the roadmap

commit.message:
Implement dynamic computation of EDT, LAT and SearchWindow (#2931). Automatic resolve request parameters using raptor heuristic search. The 'earliest departure time'(EDT), 'latest arrival time'(LAT) and 'raptor search window' is calculated from heuristics using standard "singel-iteration" raptor forward/reverse search.
 - Regression, make arriveBy work.
 - Turn 'waitAtBeginning' off.
 - Rename 'waitAtBeginningEnabled' to 'allowWaitingBetweenAccessAndTransit'.
